hopobject.name: angstrom
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_4; nl-nl) AppleWebKit/534.2+ (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0 Safari/533.16
hopobject.body:
Ångström was started by a small group of people who worked on the OpenEmbedded, OpenZaurus and OpenSimpad projects to unify their effort to make a stable and userfriendly distribution for embedded devices like handhelds, set top boxes and network-attached storage devices and more.

Some instructions targeted for beginners can be found at http://beagleboard.org/project/angstrom/
hopobject.shortdesc: A distribution tailored for embedded devices.
